extendedInfo.description: FluentBook is the remake of my first app "Fluent English". It supports more languages, has more books, and has no ads.Fluent Book will help you practice verbal understanding of a foreign language and increase your vocabulary. It works like an audio book reader and also provides translation for words that you don't understand. This app is not for beginners - you need to know the basics of the language already.There are dictionaries for 52 languages including: Arabic, Armenian, Bulgarian, Chinese, Czech, French, German, Hindi, Croatian, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, and many others.Currently it has books in English, Spanish, Russian, German, French, Italian, and Portuguese. Other languages are coming soon.  Please let me know which language you want, and I'll adjust priorities according to the number of votes.We reserve the right to anonymously track and report a user's activity inside of our app, and technical parameters of the phone to help us fix the bugs. We use primary phone email as user ID for reviews. The email is not shown to other users.

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great,
reviews.comment: Could you please put in some japanese books in here for english users? There\'s no real reason for me to use this if it doesn\'t have anything in those languages. Thank you! (5 stars when you put in japanese)   ------------------------------------- :)  I\'m sorry that this came across as demanding or as critisism, thats not how I meant it at all. I actually don\'t know japanese fluently, which is why I wanted some books in that language. I guess I just had some niave thought that you already knew someone that could help you with that! Again, I didn\'t mean to sound so demanding and my thoughts had nothing to do with critisism, this is an awesome app, it just didn\'t have the language I was looking for so I wanted to let you know in case you could somehow add one. And i\'m not just saying that i\'m sorry just to say it. I obviously made you uncomfortable in some way and I deeply apolagize. Thanks for letting me know! :)
reviews.author: Myka Correll

reviews.title: Nice concept but...
reviews.comment: It claims to  have stories is certain languages ie Japanese, but doesn\'t. It should be clearer about what content is usable. Uploading my own text file which won\'t have supported audio is pointless when I\'m looking for an app with the audio function.
reviews.author: Sam Layne
